item.title: Light is falling apart at the top, and sparks when raining, 11th July
item.description:
Has been an issue for about a year but is continually getting worse. outside 39 springbank way

item.title: Keep clear should it be removed, 11th July
item.description:

item.title: ‘Temporary Bus stop’ sign left behind after road works were finished., 11th July
item.description:
Outside 309 Old Bath Road, Cheltenham GL53 9AJ Sign has been left here since roadworks finished 3 weeks ago ( at least).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 309, Old Bath Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham

item.title: Flyposting by Estate Agent on lamppost, 11th July
item.description:
An estate agent has put a For Sale sign high up on a lamppost (public road furniture) with a scan code sign beneath it. I reported it to Cheltenham Borough Council 6 weeks ago and they did not even pass it on to you until I chased and they admitted it fell under your remit.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass verges are far too long, 11th July
item.description:
The verges haven’t been cut at all this year. They are long and obstructing visibility.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Britannia Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: General road markings, lines and stud issues problem, 11th July
item.description:
Missing either Giveway or Stop Markings. There is a Slow sign 10m back from junction. Can this be passed on to the AHR for the area to investigate what Markings are required here please
Report on FixMyStreet
